level.heading: Reviewing compliance.
level.text: Compliance with this chapter is determined in light of the facts and circumstances existing at the time a decision is made or action is taken.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon ยง 7 of the Uniform Prudent Management of Institutional Funds Act of 2007. See 7A, Pt. III, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 17-69, see notes following ยง 44-1631.
